definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He heard the contents of the glass being poured into the sink .
sentences.chinese: 他听到杯中物被倒进水盆里。

sentences.english: The basin fell to the ground broken, and the water flowed to the feet of Madame Defarge .
sentences.chinese: 水盆落地打破，水泛流到得伐石太太的脚上。

sentences.english: He ran some water in the basin and splashed it on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他从水盆中捧了点水，然后撒到自己的脸上。

sentences.english: A new basin in the chicken area.
An extravagant basin is enamelled on the interior with swimming fish.
sentences.chinese: 一个奢侈风格的水盆内釉上了鱼。

sentences.english: AN open tap in the wash room filled a basin to overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 盥洗室里的水龙头开着，水不断溢出水盆。

sentences.english: He submerged the cups in the basin.
sentences.chinese: 他把杯子都放在水盆之中。

sentences.english: Current, the faucet on the market and birdbath breed are very much.
sentences.chinese: 目前，市场上水龙头和水盆品种很多。

sentences.english: I composed this photo in my backyard birdbath.
sentences.chinese: 在我后院的“饮鸟水盆”里拍了这张照片。

definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
